data.name: Medusa Frontier Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo has very limited functionality but allows customers to see if the game engine starts correctly.
data.about_the_game: The demo has very limited functionality but allows customers to see if the game engine starts correctly.
data.short_description: The demo has very limited functionality but allows customers to see if the game engine starts correctly.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0 compatible Graphics Card with 1gb VRAM or more
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound Device
  • Additional Notes: Compatibility not guaranteed. This is a product in development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
